name: LivingHurtEvent
description: LivingHurtEvent is fired when an Entity is set to be hurt. This event is fired whenever an Entity is hurt in EntityLivingBase#damageEntity(DamageSource, float) and EntityPlayer#damageEntity(DamageSource, float). This event is fired via the ForgeHooks#onLivingHurt(EntityLivingBase, DamageSource, float) . source contains the DamageSource that caused this Entity to be hurt. #amount contains the amount of damage dealt to the Entity that was hurt. This event is Cancelable . If this event is canceled, the Entity is not hurt. This event does not have a result. HasResult This event is fired on the MinecraftForge#EVENT_BUS .
